name: timezone-search
description: An intelligent, zero-config NPM package for fuzzy searching IANA timezones by city, country, abbreviation, or IANA name. Just install and find the time, anywhere.

scripts.test:esm: node -e "import('./index.mjs').then(m => { const r = m.search('EST'); console.log('ESM test:', r.length > 0 ? 'PASS' : 'FAIL'); })"
scripts.test:cjs: node -e "const {search} = require('./index.js'); const r = search('EST'); console.log('CommonJS test:', r.length > 0 ? 'PASS' : 'FAIL');"
scripts.test:all: npm test && npm run test:cjs && npm run test:esm

author: Prashanth Krishnamurthy - techformist.com
